description:
The girls decide to go to Kurumi`s house after their practice match to discuss the game. When they enter the door, they`re greeted by Kurumi`s panicked father who screams that there`s an emergency in progress!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kouhai to Nobe Nitsure Tatsu Hinaga Kana
Oh, How I Spent the Long Spring Days Together in the Fields with Kouhai
後輩と 野辺につれ立つ 日永哉
